meanings.definition: Involving or characterized by bloodshed and violence.
meanings.sent1: The horror movie had the goriest scenes I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The battle was the goriest in the entire history of the war.
meanings.sent3: The goriest part of the story made me jump out of my seat.
meanings.sent4: The goriest details of the crime scene were hard to stomach.
meanings.sent5: The goriest images from the movie haunted my dreams.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the most gruesome or shocking scenes in a movie or story.
meanings.sent1: The goriest part of the film left me covering my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The book described the goriest events in vivid detail.
meanings.sent3: The goriest scene in the play had the audience gasping in disbelief.
meanings.sent4: The goriest moments in the story were hard to forget.
meanings.sent5: The goriest scenes in the movie were not for the faint of heart.
